stories.headline: Targeting voting wrongs
stories.summary: The investigation explored potential voting rights violations in Teaneck, N.J., revealing racially polarized voting and the potential impact of the Justice Department's probe.

stories.headline: Examining evacuation during nightclub fire
stories.summary: The project used computer models to simulate the evacuation during the 2003 Rhode Island nightclub fire, assessing factors that could have altered the tragic outcome.

stories.headline: Property data analysis finds extra tax credits
stories.summary: Investigation of property tax records in Indianapolis uncovered thousands of improperly granted homestead tax credits, costing taxpayers millions.
